data.name: Thriday Transaction Account
data.description:
Imagine a business transaction account that actually saves you time.
Team Thrive Pty Ltd ABN 15 637 676 496 (Thriday) is an authorised representative of Regional Australia Bank ABN 21 087 650 360  AFSL 241167.

features.additionalValue: Make payments with your Visa Debit card
Includes access to digital banking services
features.additionalInfo: Bank 24/7 wherever you are and whenever you want.
Unlimited withdrawals via EFTPOS, Visa Debit, ATMs, direct debits, BPAY®, Pay anyone.
This account can be used to send an NPP payment.
Combined balances of up to $250,000 per account holder are guaranteed and secured by the Australian Government.
Automatic payments can be scheduled to pay your bills and/or split your pay into designated savings accounts.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be residents of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Must be at least 18 years old.

fees.name: Staff Assisted Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies per payment, withdrawal or transfer processed by Service Staff.

fees.name: Access Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The Access Fee is a monthly fee which entitles your account to unlimited withdrawals via EFTPOS, Visa Debit, ATMs, direct debits, BPAY®, Pay anyone.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Recall Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently request us to check the transaction you may be liable for the Trace Fee. If you ask us to attempt to reverse the transaction, a Recall Fee may also apply.

fees.name: Over Limit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies for each day that a transaction is debited from a customer which results in your transaction account being drawn beyond its available balance.

fees.name: Declined Card Dispute Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where you opt to dispute a Card transaction or request further information from the merchant/retailer about a transaction a fee may apply. The fee will only apply to each dispute where evidence suggests you participated in or authorised the transaction, or failed to sufficiently protect your card details. See Visa Conditions of Use for further information.

fees.name: Interest on Over Limit Balances
fees.additionalInfo: Interest calculated Per Annum. If your Transaction Account becomes overdrawn, default interest will apply on the amount that exceeds the available balance.

fees.name: Audit Certificate Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each Audit Certificate or Bank Confirmation request submitted by you or an authorised agent (such as an accountant, solicitor or auditor) acting on your behalf.

fees.name: Replacement Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: The initial card on each account, replacements for defective cards and automatic card renewals are free, however a fee applies for each replacement card ordered at your request.

fees.name: Emergency Visa Card Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If your card is lost or stolen whilst overseas, a replacement card can be replaced within 2 business days.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a cheque deposited to your account cannot be honoured due to insufficient funds in the drawer's account this fee may apply.

fees.name: Document Searches
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour. Where you request us to retrieve documents not specifically covered elsewhere a search fee may apply per hour or part thereof.

fees.name: Electronic Transfer Trace
fees.additionalInfo: Where you erroneously request a funds transfer to an external account and subsequently request us to check the transaction you may be liable for the Trace Fee. If you ask us to attempt to reverse the transaction, a Recall Fee may also apply.

fees.name: Cheque Copy or Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies where you request a copy of a personal cheque you deposited, or Financial Institution cheque. Also applies where you wish to determine if a cheque you have written has been deposited or reached its intended destination.

fees.name: Inactive Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: If there are no transactions on your Transaction Accounts for a period of 12 months the Transaction Accounts will be considered inactive. This fee applies annually until the Transaction Accounts become active again, dormant or is closed.

fees.name: Dormant Account Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies if your Transaction Account becomes dormant, which is the result of no customer generated transaction activity for a period of seven (7) years.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Where a direct debit request is rejected by due to insufficient funds in your account, a Dishonour Fee will apply.

fees.name: Bank@Post Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A fee applies when you complete a withdrawal or deposit to your account through a Bank@Post outlet. This fee is also applicable if your transaction is declined.

fees.name: Currency Conversion Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Overseas withdrawals and purchases made using your Visa Debit card will incur a currency conversion. Fee applies for all currency denominations.

fees.name: Cheque Deposit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Your first 10 cheque deposits to your accounts each month are free, each subsequent deposit will be charged per cheque.
